author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-City Lodge Says HY ‍FULLY DILUTED NORMALISED HEPS Decreased BY 11,8%
text:
Feb 15 (Reuters) - City Lodge Hotels Ltd:
* ‍HY TOTAL REVENUE DECREASED BY 0,5% TO R787,1 MILLION​ * HY ‍FULLY DILUTED NORMALISED HEADLINE EARNINGS PER SHARE DECREASED BY 11,8% TO 400,6 CENTS​
* ‍HY NORMALISED PROFIT BEFORE TAX FOR GROUP DECREASED BY 12,1% TO R241,8 MILLION​
* CITY LODGE - APPROVED AND DECLARED INTERIM DIVIDEND NUMBER 58 OF 253,0 CENTS PER ORDINARY SHARE (GROSS) IN RESPECT OF SIX MONTHS ENDED 31 DEC 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Bangalore.newsroom@thomsonreuters.com)
